Package model

Class GroupChat

java.lang.Object
model.Addressee
model.GroupChat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Entity public class GroupChat extends Addressee
Class that represents a group chat, in which there can be several clients
Author:
Ithan Velarde, Taha Mdarhri, Aichetou M'Bareck
